name: DecisionTreeTool Project Completion
description: Workflow for completing DecisionTreeTool development and transitioning back to OpsBrain

dfc2079f.question: Are witty comments complete in all Python files?

7b5427f0.question: Add witty comments to remaining files
7b5427f0.action: Review and add engaging comments to all .py files with 30-something developer humor

2a83ab4e.question: Are all features tested and working?

64f3fffa.question: Fix failing tests and functionality
64f3fffa.action: Debug and resolve any failing tests or broken features

033fef63.question: Commit enhanced code to repository
033fef63.action: git add . && git commit -m 'feat: Enhanced DecisionTreeTool with witty comments' && git push

1f39d1c4.question: Update README and FUNCTIONALITY.md
1f39d1c4.action: Ensure README and FUNCTIONALITY.md reflect all new features with engaging tone

a4c28fd0.question: Should we create a decision tree for this project?

72d97b07.action: Document the project completion workflow as a decision tree for future reference

a1a2a058.question: Ready to transition back to OpsBrain work?

57a12a14.question: Continue DecisionTreeTool development
